code:
sequenceDiagram actor User participant vscode as vscode Copilot
(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) participant AskData as AskData
MCP Tool participant KernelMemory participant Ollama participant QDrant as QDrant DB participant FileStorage User->>vscode: Query vscode->>vscode: LLM processed query vscode->>AskData: MCP tool call \w query AskData->>KernelMemory: SearchAsync(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) KernelMemory->>Ollama: Query Ollama-->>KernelMemory: Embedding KernelMemory->>QDrant: Search embedding QDrant-->>KernelMemory: Memories KernelMemory-->>AskData: search results:
chunks + citations AskData->>AskData: Process results AskData->>KernelMemory: (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) ExportFileAsync(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) KernelMemory->>FileStorage: Retrieve files FileStorage-->>KernelMemory: Files KernelMemory-->>AskData: Files AskData->>AskData: Process files AskData-->>vscode: MCP tool response vscode->>vscode: RAG vscode-->>User: Output
repo_description: A simple repo that demo's the use of Microsoft.KernelMemory + Ollama to vector index and query BYO data.

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController'。
